<h2 id="h-hey-locksmiths" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Hey Locksmiths!</h2><p>A new chapter has arrived! With immense gratitude and a bit of nostalgic sentiment, I am sharing that the era of "Lead Stewardness" is officially over. Together, we now move into an a new era for Unlock Protocol DAO of shared leadership, guided formally by our Steward Council (introductory article will follow soon). Decentralization is not only about the technology and the system, but also how leadership is broken down bit by bit until we as humans are collectively ready for genuine autonomy.</p><p>So let's get moving, here’s your monthly (yes, that's new) DAO Call roundup, thoughtfully structured and concise so you can stay ahead of the curve as always:</p><hr><h2 id="h-core-team-updates" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Core Team Updates</h2><p>Core Team updates will start again with <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/juliengenestoux/">Julien</a> next week!</p><br><h2 id="h-operations-and-coordination" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Operations and Coordination</h2><ul><li><p><strong>New Monthly Summary Calls</strong><br>We're shifting to monthly DAO Calls (summary) that thoroughly recap recent developments, while weekly meetings will concentrate on targeted problem-solving. This gives everyone more flexibility to join discussions that resonate most.</p></li><li><p><strong>Guidance &amp; Onboarding</strong><br>For those of you who sometimes wonder where to find what in Unlock DAO, make sure to review the “<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.gg/BhCyuAWtmp">official links</a>” channel in our Discord. It is your go-to for everything from onboarding resources to brand guidelines and social media channels.</p></li><li><p><strong>Autonomous Contributions</strong><br>We're emphasizing self-guided action. Use the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nfykwijvUnv6I_PUBZKTfyzaBid1H74D/view?usp=drive_link">brand</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aKOxHgdDSjZxM6H5lYyz3OxOrBuu-ToQ/view?usp=drive_link">social media guidelines</a> posted at the end of my Lead Steward tenure as empowering tools for independent work within the DAO.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nfykwijvUnv6I_PUBZKTfyzaBid1H74D/view?usp=drive_link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" style="cursor: pointer;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-weekly-newsletter---august-5--2025/243b395eb56a5c97110daeb73fc241ea.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1080" nextwidth="1920" class="image-node embed"></a><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1386865206239432704"><strong>Enhanced Steward Roles</strong></a><br>Further clarity is on the way for the Coordination &amp; Operations Steward role, with a more strategic focus mapped out for the coming year. Keep your eyes peeled for my upcoming proposal, cause that's right, I am not going anywhere for now!</p></li><li><p><strong>Ethereum Bolivia Event Recap</strong><br>I flew over to Santa Cruz, Bolivia, throughout the last weekend and visited the Ethereum Bolivia community. It was fantastic to see so many young builders engaging with the Web3 ecosystem. Additionally, Ceci and I finally had an opportunity to meet in person and discuss matters in more depth. I will dedicate a whole article to this, cause the event was amazing!</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-weekly-newsletter---august-5--2025/01da7d2058e85beb5139fa3bd9a930cd.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1259" nextwidth="1158" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-finances-and-resources" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Finances &amp; Resources</h2><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://apebond.click/UP"><strong>ApeBond Campaign</strong></a><strong> Progress</strong><br>Our most recent campaign saw participation jump from 1% to 14%, a promising trend. Let's keep the ideas coming for how we can support the campaign. If you have ideas, please reach out to <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/cecilia-contreras-castro/">Ceci</a>, our Steward for Marketing &amp; Communications.</p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.charmverse.io/join?domain=unlock-dao"><strong>Charmverse </strong></a><strong>Platform Tier Upgrade</strong><br>The collaborative workspace became pricier after exceeding block limits, but thanks to community support by <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chriscarella/">ccarella</a> we are saved and can keep using the platform!</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-member-relations-and-governance" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Member Relations &amp; Governance</h2><ul><li><p><strong>Steward Council Transition</strong><br>While I’m still helping with transition tasks, governance is moving steadily to the new council. Proposals, like protocol structure updates and ambassador resources, are in the works to expand our DAO Guidelines.</p></li><li><p><strong>Merch Store Progress</strong><br>Through our collaboration with<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.powerofwomen.io/about"> Leah Sams</a> for the role of NFTs of Unlock DAO, we may soon be able to offer exclusive merch to all active role holders in the DAO. This means exclusive merch for outstanding DAO contributors! Below is an example of the more standardized merch that will be coming soon as well:<br></p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-weekly-newsletter---august-5--2025/57a0342a3b4d2cc29db5abb10d34df69.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="2407" nextwidth="3291" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1379567875916042241"><strong>Event Sponsorship Review</strong></a><br>Reports from a recent sponsorship (DevFest Kampala) need to be reviewed to inform even smarter event partnership strategies. Help review <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Gr-gi30d7UbiGXQ-xRFjV9qnN1V4AslN1lDVcJVdpgA/edit?usp=sharing">here</a> to guide our future sponsorship vision and make it stand out even further!</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-marketing-and-communications" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Marketing &amp; Communications</h2><ul><li><p><strong>Influencer Partnerships</strong><br>Collaborations with Ninja Promo are progressing, and the selection of specific influencers is near, with a strong focus on TikTok and X. Add to the discussion and review the current suggestions in our Marketing &amp; Communications Discord channel&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.gg/K5GJfkhcq7">here</a>.</p></li><li><p><strong>Social Media Content Pipeline</strong><br>Community-generated content is thriving. Members are encouraged to submit any format (videos, articles, photos) that highlight your Unlock story via our <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.charmverse.io/join?domain=unlock-dao">Charmverse collaborative space</a>. Creative, authentic contributions are now recognized and rewarded with $UP tokens.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-technology-and-innovation" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Technology &amp; Innovation</h2><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/EthereumBo"><strong>Ethereum Bolivia</strong></a><strong> x </strong><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1379851297829683251"><strong>Scout Game</strong></a><strong> x Unlock Collab</strong><br>Exciting new partnerships with Scout Game and Ethereum Bolivia are underway, focusing on practical building and onboarding of new developers. We are <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.deform.cc/form/506cef5d-91ad-45e5-bcc0-0c42d3f95542">currently collecting ideas</a>, so please leave us a note on what you want to see added to the protocol, re-designed, mini-apps, or whatever comes to your mind.</p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.gg/PVEZS38GkB"><strong>DAO-Centric Steward Role</strong></a><br>The Steward role for innovation and tech is being reimagined as a collaborative, bounty-based system, opening more roles for motivated builders, with guidance and mentorship provided throughout. We are looking forward to <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/dannithomx/">blahkheart's</a> adapted proposal.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-this-weeks-action-items" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">This Week's Action Items</h2><p><strong>Here’s how you can get involved this week and prepare for the discussions coming up next week:</strong></p><ol><li><p>Vote on our active Tally (onchain) proposal(s) <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tally.xyz/gov/unlock-protocol">here</a>.</p></li><li><p>Review the following topics to add to the discussion call next week:<br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.gg/K5GJfkhcq7">KOLs Campaign with Ninja Promo</a><br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1386865206239432704">Steward Proposal(s)</a><br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1379851297829683251">Scout Game Bounties</a> (what do you want to see being changed or added to Unlock Protocol, please <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.deform.cc/form/506cef5d-91ad-45e5-bcc0-0c42d3f95542">leave us a note here</a>)</p></li><li><p>Get $UP token and become an active contributor via the ApeBand campaign <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.ape.bond/bonds/0x7933424992FF4F73050ba96E3cCbFC7296853d61/8453">here</a>.</p></li><li><p>Share our social media posts and engage with campaigns across <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol">X</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@unlock.dao?_t=ZT-8sqNLXE6lfn&amp;_r=1">TikTok</a>—let’s amplify our message together!</p></li></ol><br><p>We are done with the monthly roundup! You made it and are back on top of things when it comes to everything Unlock Protocol DAO. Remember, these briefs will now get to your inbox monthly, and for the other three weeks, we will focus on the calls on critical and acute discussions, while the newsletter will start highlighting particular topics and community members!</p><p>Thank you all for your energy, ideas, and commitment throughout the last year. While I’m stepping back from Lead Steward, I’ll remain involved as we pass the torch to a collective future. Let’s keep challenging each other, reaching higher, and setting the pace for DAOs everywhere. Stewardship belongs to us all. Onward and upward, Locksmiths!</p><p>Ciao for now! See you in the chats and at our next focused call!</p><h2 id="h-stay-unlocked" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Stay Unlocked!</h2><p>Sincerely,</p><p>A DAO member named Stella<span data-name="sparkles" class="emoji" data-type="emoji">✨</span></p><br>
